name: Artemis (Aalto University - Game Design)
description:
ARTEMIS is a video game cloned from Prince of Persia 1989 as the first student project at Aalto University in Finland 2020. A team of four members collaborated to recreate the feeling of the first level in the original game, but with a new touch. Animations were improved but the mechanics and animations have the same playability experience as the original. The level Design was done almost exactly as it was in 1989 and sound and music were added based on Persian traditional-modern fusion music.

Navid Bayat: Art

Antti Mäkipää: Programming

Kaan ünlü: Programming/Project Management

Pietu Arvola: Sound/Music
